name: Burning Words
description:
Burning Words is a Game produced for the GameJam MMarmelade 8th. 

Grab your Keyboards and dive into the adventure which is called Burning Words. Help our little helpless deer with text-based comments to light up all the altars, which are dedicated to the goddess of Fire Mariana.

Base Commands:

Movement:

[Deer] move [Direction] -> moves the deer into the specified direction.

[Deer] towards [Object] -> moves the deer towards the specified object.

Interactions:

[Deer] collect [Object] -> let the deer collect objects like torches

[Deer] burn [Object] -> let the deer light the altars

Find out many other possible commands and help our deer enter the Temple of the goddess. Maybe you are even able to help the deer find the love of her life and start a family.
